definitions.definition: One who repents of sin; one sorrowful on account of their transgressions.
One under church censure , but admitted to penance ; one undergoing penance.
One under the direction of a confessor .

main_definition: One who repents of sin; one sorrowful on account of their transgressions.
secondary_definitions: One under church censure , but admitted to penance ; one undergoing penance.
One under the direction of a confessor .
